article_title: Do Republicans Have A Death Wish On Healthcare?

article_metadata.description: Do you know how Obamacare is funded? That is, do you know where the money comes from that pays for the operation of the exchanges, the subsidies people get when they buy insurance and the expansion of Medicaid to millions of new enrollees in more than half the states? I’ll bet [...]
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
